body:
Hai y'all ^~^

So about the new transformers movie... I watched it the first time 2 days after it came out. I proceeded to watch it again... The movie was so fun to watch and so good... I'm actually thinking of watching it for a 3rd time again... 

When Optimus Prime meets up in the desert and starts transforming...

I got major goosebumps...

I love this movie...

Who else watched it?

title: TF4= Goosebumps

replies.body:
When I saw the title I thought it meant "Team Fortress 4" and I was going to flip out. Team Fortress 3 didn't even come out, but of course we all know Valve can't count to 3...

Anyways.
I saw the movie and it was honestly really awesome!
